title: Pixel 3 XL shows as charging when it is not
content:
I have a Pixel 3 XL that is showing that it's charging (the lightning bolt on the battery icon) even when it isn't charging. It also seems to be draining faster than normal, but that is more of a casual observation.

I do not believe the charging port is physically broken.

Does anyone have any suggestions? I would prefer not to do a hard reset except as a last resort.

Thanks in advance.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
